subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Olympic Games (2016)
America's Cup
Windsurfing
lead_paragraph: Kiteboarding’s in, and the International Sailing Federation’s proposed slate of classes for the 2016 Olympics may leave the image of the proper yachtsman high and dry.
snippet: Kiteboarding’s in, and the International Sailing Federation’s proposed slate of classes for the 2016 Olympics may leave the image of the proper yachtsman high and dry.
